article-meta.issue-title: Special Issue: Social Movements, Civil Society and Corporations

body.p: Organization Studies would like to warmly thank the following colleagues for generously giving their time as reviewers for this Special Issue:

Ralph Armbruster-Sandoval, Michael Biggs, Magnus Boström, Helena Buhr, Ed Carberry, Neil Caren, Katherine Chen, Curtis Child, Michaela DeSoucey, Marc Dixon, Beth Duckles, Gemma Edwards, Henry Farrell, Luc Fransen, Robert Freeland, Michael Haedicke, Kathryn Heinze, Mary Hunter-Morris, David Hyatt, Kate Kellogg, Caroline Lee, Omar Lizardo, Isaac Martin, Amit Nigam, Siobhan O’Mahoney, Anne-Claire Pache, Guido Palazzo, Florence Palpacuer, Andreas Rasche, Juliane Riese, Fabio Rojas, Sandra Rothenberg, Sean Safford, Michael Sauder, Marc Schneiberg, Mai Skjøtt Linneberg, Sara Soderstrom, Sarah Soule, Suzanne Staggenborg, Yvette Taminiau, Mike Toffel, Kiyoteru Tsuitsui, Mariette van Huijstee, Frank Wijen, Cornelia Woll, Melissa Wooten, Sabrina Zajak and Charlene Zietsma.
